â€œWhat an all around smooth buzz. A delight from the first puff to the last. The smoke is soooo smooth. Very little coughing and the smell and taste is like...well... oranges.

The high is focused and euphoric, powerful, but not over the top. It is easy to manage social situations and still feel great without the stoned" look.

â€œpretty good buzz really spacey almost at first but becomes a really relaxing focused high that's really potent I gotta say I'm pretty happy with this strain but I think I couldn't have spent 40 bucks better definitely a great Sativa feel nothings really lacking gotta love the diesel genesâ€

â€œIn my top three youâ€™ll find Sour Cookies, Cotton Candy, and in first place my all-time favorite Orange Diesel. What a pleasant experience truly, never have I had such an amazing tasting bud. I kid you not, ever hit I took it tasted like I was taking a bite from a fresh orange. Like, no joke I swear it tasted just like the fruit. And the high was pretty nice too, my dad and I were on our way to my grandmas house after...â€

â€œGood head high, the type of high where you gotta listen to the best tunes you can find and just relax. Munchies will be needed and eyedrops( if you live alone or like your eyes bloodshot then your fine) are a definite need for this strain. Overall very good head high and gives you energy and uplifts you.â€

â€œThe stuff I got is locally called Orange Turbo (NYC Diesel and Orange Velvet) I love the all over good feeling of this bud! I hit lightly because other reviews said it was potent. I am a huge fan of orange and purple strains for Fibromyalgia. This takes care of fatigue, stress and stiff muscles well. Highly recommend listening to Etta James Radio on Orange Diesel!â€
â€œGreat strain amazing head high and it's very relaxing. Has more of a diesel taste than anything but you can taste hints of orange. If you have the option to smoke this strain take it.â€

â€œThis is my new #1 favorite daytime strain!
Amazing energy! No paranoia, no tiredness.â€
â€œnice wake up with this sativa. couple cups of coffee and a bowl and I feel ready to start my day.â€
â€œIâ€™m stoned...taste really nice smooth!!9/10 coming from a real smoker!â€

â€œI suffer from intense anxiety and panic along with depression. I've struggled on and off trying to find a strain that didn't give me more of either. whether anxiety, paranoia, or sluggish. with orange diesel, my heart rate is dramatically lower at the peak of a high than any other strain(it's usually on the higher side). with that being said, it's actually a little lower than without weed. someone who struggles with ...â€

â€œall the feel of a brain freeze without the pain!!! a quick numbness washes from your head to face and everything down to your toes. really puts a grin on your face. kicks depression and pains ass. I think this strain will also help with social issueâ€

â€œThe taste was dirty adnd dry.  There was no primary flavor or aroma wait this sample. The high is light and quick. Not my thing. but it might be good for a rookie or somebody who digs really having to pay attention to know they're high...â€
â€œNice and smooth. I got this off my dispensary's middle shelf per my bud tender's recommendation and it's definitely lit.â€
â€œAwesome, works the best for my ADHD and PTSD better then any other in my past of 20 yearsâ€

â€œNice mellow high, light enjoyable body buzz, but with a relaxed bit of energy. I like that I can smoke it and still focus on my task. Good to use while painting or doing other creative things. Two Thumbs Up!â€

â€œGreat smelling bud. For those who some how don't like the smell of og's this is a very good smell for u. I suggest your first hit of this to be a small one, as the effects settle in almost instantaneously. A great bud smoke plenty of(within limits). Very good bud to roll, but is also very smooth in a bong.â€
â€œAwesome, works the best for my ADHD and PTSD better then any other in my past of 20 yearsâ€

â€œWow!! Had the v3 strain... taste was amazing!! After finishing I had the urge to get up and do something productive then had the munchies phase. This was then followed by a nice full body relation tingle and dizzy room... all in all a great strain!!â€
â€œVery good mellow vibe. Very much head high but not in your thoughts and can be very productive off this strain. Really liked itâ€

â€œVery good strain. Only problem I had with this was the feel of it, the nugs I had were close to the feel of regs, that really dried type. But needless to say the bud had tons of orange in it, and boy it gets you gone! I was good off 2-3 bowls (sharing with a friend) and it hit me hard!â€
â€œA very potent head high that provides a cerebral experience. The more you smoke, the further you tumble down a rabbit hole. Sometimes, at your own risk.â€

â€œWow. What an awesome Strain. Iâ€™m not normally the biggest Sativa person, but I was thoroughly impressed. From beginning to end, the experience was satisfying. The smell of oranges filled my nostrils while breaking up the Bud in my Grinder. One pack in my Vape was all it took for me to hit liftoff. It was a fast hitting head high that left me focused and euphoric at the same time. Canâ€™t wait to enjoy some more of this...â€

â€œNow it's starting to grow on me , at first it was just mediocre compared to strong & intense satiiva of which I usually medicate to, but since indulging in this strain for the past month, it really is a very good & unique hybrid , the smell & taste is very much on its own level , very good , a solid 4 star hybrid all day & nightâ€

â€œI had this strain in my stash and was not impressed by its look, the buds where mini compared to other strains, kinda avoided it for a while. 
Yesterday had to do some editing (post production photography) and medicated with some of it.... OMG in a span of 4 hours I smoked twice and got work done for 8 hours and the best part, it felt like 5 min gone by and all this work done.
I underestimated this strain, makes me v...â€

â€œBought a quarter of this strain and do not regret it whatsoever. The bud was very dense and the batch patently smelt of sweet, fresh oranges. The aroma after being lit, unlike other strains, was still particularly sweet and that harsh, pungent scent did not reside anywhere in my hou...â€
â€œKind of weak. You need to smoke a good amount to get baked. Not bad though. Great feeling high. Good for watching movies.â€

â€œThe head high is amazing but the first hit taste always throws me off.  Much more diesel taste than the Sour D with the citrusy orange hint too it.  Strange but not terrible.  I recommend tryin this one out if you get the opportunity.â€
â€œreally talkative, really giggly. flies really high but coming back down is harshâ€
â€œHas an extremely unique flavor profile to it, smells like sour oranges yet when smoked it tastes like clean diesel with notes or orange to it, more of a night time smokeâ€

â€œThis is a very nice strain. At first smell it almost reminded me of cheese. But upon closer smelling it after breaking it up in the grinder, it has a very distinct diesel smell that we are all used to with Sour D. 

I smoke it out of a new pipe and it had a very fruity orange taste after blowing the smoke out. 

Def a daytime weed that is good for wake and bakes. I would recommend this for creative thinking while sti...â€
